verses.verse: And I-yov <S%H347><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>,
No doubt <S%H551><s%> but ye are the people <S%H5971><s%>, and wisdom <S%H2451><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with you.
But <S%H1571><s%> I have understanding <S%H3824><s%> as well as you; I am not inferior <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to you: yea, who knoweth not such things <S%H3644><s%> as these?

I am as one mocked <S%H7814><s%> of his neighbour <S%H7453><s%>, who calleth <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8802><s%> upon 'Elohim <S%H433><s%>, and he answereth <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him: the just <S%H6662><s%> upright <S%H8549><s%> man is laughed to scorn <S%H7814><s%>.

He that is ready <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8737><s%> to slip <S%H4571><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with his feet <S%H7272><s%> is as a Menorah <S%H3940><s%> despised <S%H937><s%> in the thought <S%H6248><s%> of him that is at ease <S%H7600><s%>.

The tabernacles <S%H168><s%> of robbers <S%H7703><s%> <S%H8802><s%> prosper <S%H7951><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and they that provoke <S%H7264><s%> <S%H8688><s%> 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> are secure <S%H987><s%>; into whose hand <S%H3027><s%> 'Elohim <S%H433><s%> bringeth <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> abundantly.

But <S%H199><s%> ask <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8798><s%> now the beasts <S%H929><s%>, and they shall teach <S%H3384><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee; and the fowls <S%H5775><s%> of the air <S%H8064><s%>, and they shall tell <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee:

Or speak <S%H7878><s%> <S%H8798><s%> to the earth <S%H776><s%>, and it shall teach <S%H3384><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee: and the fishes <S%H1709><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> shall declare <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto thee.
Who knoweth <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not in all these that the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath wrought <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> this?
In whose hand <S%H3027><s%> is the soul <S%H5315><s%> of every living thing <S%H2416><s%>, and the breath <S%H7307><s%> of all mankind <S%H376><s%> <S%H1320><s%>.
Doth not the ear <S%H241><s%> try <S%H974><s%> <S%H8799><s%> words <S%H4405><s%>? and the mouth <S%H2441><s%> taste <S%H2938><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his meat <S%H400><s%> ?
With the ancient <S%H3453><s%> is wisdom <S%H2451><s%>; and in length <S%H753><s%> of days <S%H3117><s%> understanding <S%H8394><s%>.
With him is wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and strength <S%H1369><s%>, he hath counsel <S%H6098><s%> and understanding <S%H8394><s%>.

Behold, he breaketh down <S%H2040><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and it cannot be built again <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8735><s%>: he shutteth up <S%H5462><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a man <S%H376><s%>, and there can be no opening <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.

Behold, he withholdeth <S%H6113><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%>, and they dry up <S%H3001><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: also he sendeth them out <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, and they overturn <S%H2015><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>.
With him is strength <S%H5797><s%> and wisdom <S%H8454><s%>: the deceived <S%H7683><s%> <S%H8802><s%> and the deceiver <S%H7686><s%> <S%H8688><s%> are his.
He leadeth <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8688><s%> counsellors <S%H3289><s%> <S%H8802><s%> away spoiled <S%H7758><s%>, and maketh the judges <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8802><s%> fools <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8779><s%>.
He looseht <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the bond <S%H4148><s%> of kings <S%H4428><s%>, and girdeth <S%H631><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their loins <S%H4975><s%> with a girdle <S%H232><s%>.
He leadeth <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8688><s%> princes <S%H3548><s%> away spoiled <S%H7758><s%>, and overthroweth <S%H5557><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the mighty <S%H386><s%>.

He removeth away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8688><s%> the speech <S%H8193><s%> of the trusty <S%H539><s%> <S%H8737><s%>, and taketh away <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the understanding <S%H2940><s%> of the aged <S%H2205><s%>.
He poureth <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8802><s%> contempt <S%H937><s%> upon princes <S%H5081><s%>, and weakeneth <S%H7503><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the strength <S%H4206><s%> of the mighty <S%H650><s%>.

He discovereth <S%H1540><s%> <S%H8764><s%> deep things <S%H6013><s%> out of darkness <S%H2822><s%>, and bringeth out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8686><s%> to light <S%H216><s%> the shadow of death <S%H6757><s%>.

He increaseht <S%H7679><s%> <S%H8688><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and destroyeth <S%H6><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them: he enlargeth <S%H7849><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and straiteneth <S%H5148><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them again.

He taketh away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8688><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, and causeht them to wander <S%H8582><s%> <S%H8686><s%> in a wilderness <S%H8414><s%> where there is no way <S%H1870><s%>.
They grope <S%H4959><s%> <S%H8762><s%> in the dark <S%H2822><s%> without light <S%H216><s%>, and he maketh them to stagger <S%H8582><s%> <S%H8686><s%> like a drunken <S%H7910><s%> man.
